Loading libraries
```{r}
library(spdep)
library(sf)
library(maptools)
library(spatstat)
library(raster)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(ggmap)
```


Reading in the shape file for Maharashtra administative boundries

```{r}
mhshp <- st_read(here("Shape/maharashtra_administrative.shp")) %>%
  filter(ADMIN_LEVE == 5) %>%
  select(-ADMIN_LEVE) 


dam_locations <- read_excel("Data/dam_locations.xlsx", 
    col_names = FALSE) %>%
  rename(dams = ...1,
         lat = ...2,
         long = ...3)

cords <- dam_locations %>%
  select(-dams) 


ggplot(dam_locations, aes(long, lat))+
  geom_point()
  
  
cords <- coordinates(cords)


mh_ras <- raster(mhshp)
res(mh_ras) <- 1


dam_ras <- rasterize(cords, mh_ras, background = 0)
plot()


```
